sourceDesc.p: Based on the fra-eng dictionary from Freedict.
Lots of new words added, (a few deleted) parts of speech added. Genders added. Some horrible errors corrected. Probably some new errors introduced.
Verbs were identified using "verbiste", nouns by using freedict's fra-deu dictionary (definitions starting with upper case were assumed to be nouns).
